sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with lou chuang 瘺瘡 , fistula sores. Ming yi bie lu 名醫別錄 Substance Entry man li yu 鰻鱺 魚：主五痔，瘡瘺，殺諸蟲 , “It controls the five types of piles, and fistulas , and it kills all types of bugs/worms”. Chuang ni 瘡䘌 , hidden-worms sores [2]

Pathological Condition identical with ni chuang 䘌瘡. Pu ji fang 普濟方 130: 傷寒八九日至十餘日，大煩 渴熱盛而三焦有瘡䘌者，多下 , “When in the course of harm caused by cold from the eighth, ninth day to the tenth day [patients experience] massive vexation, thirst, an abundance of heat, and hidden-worms sores in the region of the triple burner, this is often accompanied by diarrhea”.
